column3: So, the first ten floors posed little obstacle to our intrepid friend. Or should I say, the Warrior of Light?
After all, this is what Eorzeans call such a hero, is that not so? A title befitting the one who triumphed over the Black Wolf of Garlemald.
I had no idea western affairs were within your purview. Just how far does your reach extend?
Hmph. You've too many secrets for my liking, but very well. Have it your way.
And have it my way I shall. For this is merely the beginning.
The challenger has conquered the twentieth floor, and it is only a matter of time before <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> arrives to confront you. May I suggest that─
Yes, quite. In that case, I shall leave you to attend to your duties, as I return to mine. Fare thee well.
